inclusion.criterion: New adult renal transplant recipients with good renal function defined as serum creatinine less than 2.6 mg/dl
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No contraindication to ACE inhibitor use
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Renal transplant patients with persistent serum creatinine levels over 2.5 mg/dl
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Hyperkalemia with serum potassium levels over 5.5 mEQ/dl
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of allergic reaction to ACE inhibitors or angiotensin receptor blockers
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 3-day-old Asian female infant with uncomplicated neonatal jaundice. She has normal serum potassium levels and no contraindication to ACE inhibitor use, but her renal function is not explicitly stated as good.
